text: 14.10: Mt 25.31-32; FG 10.42; 17.31; 2 Ko 5.10Maaŋ muuŋgiap, ndu thaŋ nzuav wo phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma mbui tɨvi garav, buni mbatɨgir ana nzuai? Ndu thaŋ nzuav wo phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi guma mbevav ana nzuai? Ndu khueŋ kaŋgi, nza zam Fhe Bakɨme nɨma thivgirim, ana nza muuŋgi tɨvi ga suaŋv nza suanga.
